body:
ChaNGa is a code to perform collisionless N-body simulations. It can perform cosmological simulations with periodic boundary conditions in comoving coordinates or simulations of isolated stellar systems.

[http://faculty.washington.edu/trq/hpcc/tools/changa.html](http://faculty.washington.edu/trq/hpcc/tools/changa.html)
title: New Package: ChaNGa
